name: Tempo! (Ruby Raccoon, TustinJimberlake, TheWillgamer)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

[Left Mouse Button] - Shoot

[R] - Start Song or Change song

[Space] - Dash

A fun arcade shooter where you can cycle through songs and kill enemies by matching with the tempo. Tons of fun working on it. Hope you have fun playing it ^0^

Ruby Raccoon - Music, Game Design. - https://soundcloud.com/enid-ignite
TheWillGamer99 - Coding, Game Design.
Skyler Payne - 3D models
Adam Andreatta - Coding
KozanPink - Hud Art - https://twitter.com/kozanpink?t=IUkusvzsCz5P2aJCqNOnCQ&s=09
Kevin - Extra Musical Ear
OnixSaga - Main Menu Art

Feel free to post your score with your comment I'm curious! :)
